data.name: Urban War Defense Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo includes one endless playable level with no restrictions enjoy the game and play for as long as you can survive.
data.about_the_game: The demo includes one endless playable level with no restrictions enjoy the game and play for as long as you can survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 460 or Radeon HD 3800
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Quad
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760+ or Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
